INSTRUMENT: FIELD PORTABLE ANEMOMETER MASTS HOST: FIELD EXPERIMENT
Instrument Information ====================== Instrument Id : AWND Instrument Host Id : FEXP Pi Pds User Id : RGREELEY Instrument Name : FIELD PORTABLE ANEMOMETER MASTS Instrument Type : ANEMOMETER
Instrument Description ====================== Boundary layer wind profiles were measured using field-portable anemometer masts with a total height of 9.8 m. Cup anemometers (Tradewinds) were placed at heights with a logarithmic spacing of 0.75, 1.25, 2.07, 3.44, 5.72, and 9.5 m. Pairs of AD590 temperature sensors were placed in a shielded and ventilated mounting at heights of 1.3 and 9.6 m. Wind directions were measured with WD1 instruments from Remote Measurement Systems at heights of 9.7 m and 1.5 m.
Data were recorded using an ADC-1 analog to digital converter and a Tandy 102 computer as a data logger. A recording interval of 20 minutes was adopted, so all data represent a 20 minute average of wind speed and temperature conditions. Data were stored in the field on cassette tapes.
Science Objectives ================== Measure atmospheric boundary layer air temperature, wind speed, and wind direction.
